website_summaries.verdict: If you prefer a bowl storage set, it's a good option. Otherwise, choose the Fridgesmart or One-Touch sets that offer spacious interiors and reliable seals.
pros: Combines a classic bowl design and vibrant colors to fit a variety of storage needs and kitchen decor
cons: We found that the lids a awkward to seal, and don't fit as effortlessly as they do on other models we reviewed

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Why oh why did I wait so long to get these?! I love these bowls and use all three sizes. They are great for tossing salads or whatever else and having 3 different colors is lovely to keep things organized in my fridge. I normally like to use stainless or glass containers but they don't make large enough sizes with a sealed lid. Tupperware has been around forever for a reason. I know these will last me a very long time and I'm super happy I finally purchased. Funny how having the right equipment in the kitchen makes all the difference in my food prep. Just get them, you'll love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Lady

customer_reviews.title: Love these bowls
customer_reviews.text: You can't really go wrong with Tupperware. I use these to store leftovers daily. The varying sizes are helpful, they clean easily, the colors are cute and they're just transparent enough to see what's inside without opening the lid. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware - 3 pieceQuality Tupperware
customer_reviews.text: We have had the tupperware since Dec. and have not had the occasion to use it much. This week I used the blue one and found it impossible to get the top to fit. Why would this happen? I am very upset about this since when I received them they appeared to be of good quality. These were very expensive and I feel I should be able to put the covers on the bowls - the way they work now - they are useless. What can I do about this? Peggy Lenyo lenyopeggy@yahoo.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Medium Size and Liquid Tight too!
customer_reviews.text: I love Tupperware's Wonderlier Bowls!!! They are the perfect size for medium sized batches of potato salad or coleslaw, tossed salad, fruit salad, or any side dish requiring refrigeration. I love the liquid-tight seal of the lids too!!! If they tip over in the ice chest during transport, nothing seeps out!!! The colors are great too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deep Forest

customer_reviews.title: Still the best choice ever!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best bowls ever. Being able to "burp" out all of the air, is the difference compared to other similar "air tight" containers. Air tight only means more air won't get in. These bowls get the air out and keep it out for much longer, fresh storage! Perfect for salad:)
customer_reviews.author: K. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: My guacomole dip!
customer_reviews.text: I have used Tupperware forever and still have a lettuce container from the 80's! I bought these new bowls and used one to store my leftover guacamole dip from a party. When I went to eat the dip the next day, it was still green instead of turning a brown color from oxidation! I am so happy that Tupperware is still the quality product I remember.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware is #1
customer_reviews.text: I love these Tupperware bowls. I have some antique plain white with blue lids from years ago. I bought this set to replace it and put the old ones in our camper. These bowls are the best and the colors are fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara M Creswell

customer_reviews.title: I love these bowls.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for myself and use them constantly. I think they are priced too high or I would have bought more.
customer_reviews.author: felicia sayre

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic feels pretty sturdy and I love the colors! The only reason I'm giving it 4 stars is because the green container is REALLY hard to close. I'll have to just use it as a mixing bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Choux

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking in my dorm
customer_reviews.text: Great for cooking in my dorm. I love the bright colours and that they've got coordinating lids. I wish you could be 100% sure it was ok to microwave though. Some products are OK until they hit a certain temperature and it'd be nice to be able to stick a tub with leftover food from the fridge right to the microwave without having to get an extra plate dirty.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tupperware product
customer_reviews.text: Have always had a version of these bowls...needed to replace due to lids wearing out. They are pricey, but hold up well and are a must in my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: What I needed
customer_reviews.text: I have been making a big batch of something and microwave it for a quick meal. I needed another large Tupperware so bought this set. So far happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Size small
customer_reviews.text: For the price the items were a lot smaller then expected. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy p

customer_reviews.title: The Quality ...it's all about the quality
customer_reviews.text: A product that stands above many other similar products..it's all about the quality.

customer_reviews.title: Lids are troublesome
customer_reviews.text: These are harder plastic and thinner than prior Tupperware. The lids are very hard to get on because of such stiffness

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Beautiful colors and closes tightly! Tupperware is my favorite!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these new bowls, perfect sizes and nice colors. These are Tupperware, durable and should last a long time. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Julieanna Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they are a little more expensive, but worth every penny. You cannot go wrong with Tupperware. The colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: WK

customer_reviews.title: It's Tupperware--Great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice trio of bowls for storage. Have other Tupperware 30+ years and still quite functional!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What can you say about Tupperware other than these are ...
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about Tupperware other than these are just what we needed. You need additional colors and CLEAR..

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat Tupperware!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect condition on arrival; excited to add these vibrant colors for my refrigerated storage needs.

customer_reviews.title: Ugly but perfectly usable.
customer_reviews.text: Colors are hideous but what the hay. Good old tupperware.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bowls
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy bowls. The ones I had been using were 25 years old and they showed it so I replaced them. These are the same ones I had except they are difference colors now. I love Tupperware.
customer_reviews.author: Maria T. Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: It's Tupperware. What can I say? High quality, nice container sizes and we use them all the time. Love these bowls!
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware bowls are great!
customer_reviews.text: Until recently, I had been using Tupperware products that I purchased many years ago. As I became concerned about BPA in plastics, I checked the Tupperware website. They guaranteed that any of their products sold 2010 or later was free of BPA. I decided to replace my old stuff with new for this reason. Tupperware lasts and lasts, so I consider it a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Good bowls with lids!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for bowls with lids for easier transport (I attend LOTS of family gatherings and community events) and these are great! I'm happy I no longer have to use tinfoil or Saran Wrap to cover my foods and hope other things down smash down on the food and squish it out of the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten T.

customer_reviews.title: the bowls were the wrong color size and were a bad copy of Tupperware products
customer_reviews.text: product was shipped from a third party. the bowls were the wrong color size and were a bad copy of Tupperware products. they also had defects from manufacturing and stunk.

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware is expensive but is good quality and comes with a guarantee
customer_reviews.text: I like Tupperware and have used it for many years. Even sold it at one time. I like that these bowls are clear and I can see what’s inside without taking the lid off

customer_reviews.title: Nice bowls
customer_reviews.text: These bowls are nice. I definitely will buy another set. I use them daily......

customer_reviews.text: Love the new colors--same great product, pretty new colors. If you want to lock in freshness, Tupperware...really locks it in!

customer_reviews.title: Wroks like a charm every time
customer_reviews.text: Tupperware never disappoints and lasts forever. I finally gave up a set of bowls from the 1980's to get these new bowls with updated colors. Wroks like a charm every time.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: My old Tupperware bowl cover finally broke after 35 years! I will leave the new ones in my will!!!

customer_reviews.text: Love all the bowls but one of the bowls lids was the biggest struggle to get on it wasn't lining up right.

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: We been buying Tupperware for the longest time. I bought these for my aunt for mother’s day so idk how they turned out.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like the old school
customer_reviews.text: Love them! They are durable and do not fail the Tupoerware name.

customer_reviews.title: I love Tupperware, it is durable
customer_reviews.text: I love Tupperware, it is durable, and long lasting. My problem with this set is the small bowl's lid does not fit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Routzahn

customer_reviews.title: TupperBabe Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: Tupperware products have been a favorite of mine for years. What set this purchase apart was a glitch in the system, which resulted in a delay. As soon as TupperBabe (Eve) was made aware of the situation, she immediately emailed an acknowledgement, and I received my order promptly. She was also kind enough to include a bonus gift, and personally emailed an apology. I inadvertently deleted her message from my new phone (talk about a glitch!)and I was unable to personally respond. So I'm happy to report that the Tupperware Wonderlier Bowl Set is terrific, and I'm very glad that I chose to purchase the set from a vendor as caring, competent, and classy as TupperBabe. Thanks Eve! Dale
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Time for a refresh
customer_reviews.text: i had some Tupperware bowls that were looking a little rough. They were 30 years old. It was time to replace them with new colors. I definitely got my monies worth.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Piper

customer_reviews.title: Best Storage Product Ever
customer_reviews.text: I am a lifelong Tupperware lover. This newest set did not disappoint me.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: My old Wonderlier Set Disappeared.  It didn't wear out.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat these bowls for storing food and taking it places. I think that's why I had to buy more. I've taken my 30-year-old bowls somewhere and left them, and other food-toters have claimed them.
customer_reviews.author: catb

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey but product quality has always been good
customer_reviews.text: Tupperware is always my go to product but price is a little high

customer_reviews.title: Tupperware is tops
customer_reviews.text: Longtime fan of Tupperware. It never wears out and stays really new looking. The bowls are perfect and I like the cheery colors.

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Tupperware.

customer_reviews.title: Tuppeware bowls
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bowls to replace my old tupperware bowls I had and I am glad I did. I am going to buy more. Tupperware bowls are great. I love the coloers and the tight lid closure.

customer_reviews.title: Love Tupperware

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love Tupperware! This set is cute and I use it a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My mom had the original Tupperware when we were growing up and I remember having it for several years. So, now that I have my own place, I decided to spend the money on some of my own. It is well worth the price! It is so much more durable than any other brand! It seals tightly, so I don't worry when I'm taking something in the car. It also cleans out better. We eat a lot of pasta and unlike all my other brands, my Tupperware doesn't stain. I will be using nothing but Tupperware from here on out!
customer_reviews.author: T Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: The lids don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: The lids on the large and small bowls don't fit. Only the medium-sized lid snaps on easily. This is extremely disappointing, as I've used Tupperware products for years. In fact, I still have containers that are two decades old which are in pristine condition.

customer_reviews.title: FREEZER BURN STILL HAPPENS!
customer_reviews.text: I PURPOSELY INVESTED MORE MONEY THAN I WANTED TO IN THE HOPES OF NO LONGER GETTING FREEZER BURN IN MY STORED FOOD. TUPERWARE HAS BEEN THE LEADER IN THIS AREA FOR AGES. HOWEVER, EVEN AFTER INVESTING IN THESE 3 PIECE BOWLS (I PURCHASED 2 SETS) THE FOOD I FROZE STILL HAD FREEZER BURN ON THE TOP. THIS WAS A MAJOR DISAPPOINTMENT - NOT TO MENTION A LARGE OUTLAY OF MONEY FOR A PRODUCT THAT SIMPLY DID NOT DELIVER.
customer_reviews.author: Creative Ca

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice set! I bought it as a gift for my parents that love Tupperware. Their old set had pretty much wore out and the colors was great.

customer_reviews.title: Good Tupperware Bowl Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace the set of Tupperware bowls I bought nearly 20 years ago. The bowls themselves are still going strong but the lids long disintegrated. All I really needed was new lids but couldn't find any so I ended up buying a new set. These are just like the others except have colors and the lids are exactly the same. I expect these to last a long time too.

customer_reviews.text: Good size and nice colors. Seem sturdy enough but tops are difficult to anchor down and they don’t burp like the older traditional ones in order to get any air to release.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. One of the lids is very difficult to ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. One of the lids is very difficult to get on and the quality is not like how I remember Tupperware to be.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Rudnicki

customer_reviews.title: Not That Easy...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these. The blue color scheme is really vibrant and pretty. However, I found these harder to close than other Tupperware products. I had bought these to use as containers for my homemade ice cream. Something about them getting colder made them every more difficult to close than usual. Don't be surprised if you are not able to easily close the lids on this Tupperware set. For my purposes I found I was almost better off sealing bowls with siran wrap.
customer_reviews.author: ArmyWife76

product_meta.title: New Tupperware Wonderlier Bowl Set 3 in New Colors (Large)
product_meta.description: Set of 3 Tupperware Wonderlier Bowls in Verde Salsa Green (6 cup size), Tropical Water Blue (8 cup size) and Daisy Purple (12 cup size). Virtually airtight, liquid-tight seals. Ideal for mixing, storing, serving, and transporting foods.
feature_bullets: Set of three includes one 6 cup, one 8 cup, and one 12 Cup

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars427 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Warranty Description: Warranted by tupperware against chipping, cracking, breaking or peeling under normal non-commercial use for the lifetime of the product.
